notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Wo content bɛyɛ anonymized wɔ 7 daeɛ mu ma
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Wo nyinaa content wɔ community yi mu bɛyɛ anonymized na ɛbɛfa wɔ archive mu wɔ 7 daeɛ mu, akyi no wo rennkyɛ akyerɛ no anaa sesa no. Hwɛ wo content no ase.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Wo nyinaa content wɔ group yi mu bɛyɛ anonymized na ɛbɛfa wɔ archive mu wɔ 7 daeɛ mu, akyi no wo rennkyɛ akyerɛ no anaa sesa no. Hwɛ wo content no ase.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Klike wɔ community link no ase, log in sɛ admin na yɛ Fraud management fii menu no mu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Nɔmba a ɛyɛ possible fraudulent activities ne estimated 75% chance of fraud
email.possibleFraudInformation: Yɛn automated system no ahyɛase a ɛda hɔ adi akyerɛ sɛ ho fihodie bɛyɛ possible. Wobɛtumi asɔhwɛ yiye fii Community admin interface no mu. Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, edi kan no, sɛnea ɛtɔ so a, yɛbɛyɛ adwene sɛ yɛde bɛtɔ content no.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: AI algorithms a ɛda hɔ adi akyerɛ sɛ content yi yɛ toxic na ɛbɛyɛ a, yɛde bɛtɔ no sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ. Wobɛtumi ama content no sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: AI algorithm a ɛda hɔ adi akyerɛ sɛ visual imagery a ɛkɔ so wɔ content yi mu. Algorithm no asɔhwɛ imagery a ɛka ho kwan ma possible adult, violent, medical, ne racy imagery. Wobɛtumi ama content no sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Da biara AI algorithm no bɛbɔ sɔɔ asɛm a ɛnyɛ papa, wɔ saa ɛkɛse no, ɛnsɛ sɛ woyɛ biribi ara na wobɛtumi ama email no adane.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Borɔfo nsɛm a ɛyɛ asɛm no adwuma
